column2: The sword of King Peter, "Rhindon" ,Bane of Wolves
You must use the bow only in great need. It does not easily miss
In this bottle, there is a cordial made of the juice of the fire-flowers that grow in the mountains of the sun. If you or any of your friends are hurt, a few drops will restore them
When you put this horn to your lips and blow it, then, wherever you are, I think help of some kind will come to you.
A Great Wand of Ice, this wand belongs to Jadis who used it to freeze her enemies.
The sword of King Olvin, used to kill the dragon of Mt Pire
The Crown of the Moon Goddess
